text: Q11. | The format of the single-precision floating point representation of a real number as per the IEEE 754 standard is as follows: 1-bit Sign | 8-bitsExponent | 23-bits Mantissa A float type variable X is assigned the decimal value of -2-147. The representation of X in hexadecimal notation is (a) 0x80000001 (b) 0x80000002 (c) 0x80000003 (d) 0x80000004
